definition.name: Install LLVM and Clang
definition.description: Downloads and installs LLVM and Clang binaries.
definition.author: lukka

inputs.name: version
inputs.description: The version of LLVM and Clang binaries to install.

inputs.name: force-version
inputs.description: Whether to accept unsupported LLVM and Clang versions.

inputs.name: ubuntu-version
inputs.description: The version override of Ubuntu to use for the Linux platform.

inputs.name: directory
inputs.description: The directory to install LLVM and Clang binaries to.

inputs.name: cached
inputs.description: Whether the LLVM and Clang binaries were cached.

inputs.name: download-url
inputs.description: The URL to download LLVM and Clang binaries from.

inputs.name: auth
inputs.description: The Authorization header to use when downloading LLVM and Clang binaries.

inputs.name: env
inputs.description: Whether to set CC and CXX environment variables to Clang paths.

outputs.name: version
outputs.description: The full version of LLVM and Clang binaries installed.
